name: Green Marquis
description:
Feature of game:
  • Changing gravity
  • Physics
  • Pixel art
  • Convenient control
  • Progress
  • A vivid main character
  • Doors and locks

Green Marquis can change gravity and open doors, direct the Marquis in different directions by switching gravity with the keys up, down, left and right. Together with the main character, there are various colored objects on the level, both helping and interfering with the passage of the game.
